metadata.title: CVE-2024-26648 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix variable deferencing before NULL check inedp_setup_replay() In edp_setup_replay(), 'struct dc *dc' & 'structdmub_replay *replay' was dereferenced before the pointer 'link' & 'replay'NULL check. Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/link/protocols/link_edp_panel_control.c:947edp_setup_replay() warn: variable dereferenced before check 'link' (seeline 933)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
